description: Modulators of TCR signaling and T cell activation from a genome-wide screen, with positive regulators on the left and negative regulators on the right (known and unknown).  Adapted from figure 2F from [https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30449619/ Shifrut et al.], and originally adapted from [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20067622 NetPath].
title: Modulators of TCR signaling and T cell activation
